sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import Yearly from "./yearly"; import "../styleSheet.css"; class InputsValue extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { ctcValue: 0, baseSalary: 0, hraValue: 0, daValue: 0, totalEarned: 0, TDS: 0, PT: 0, PF: 0, NetPay: 0, }; } getCTC = (event) => { let ctcNewvalue = event.target.value; this.setState({ ctcValue: ctcNewvalue, }); }; salaryEarned = () => { let ctcValue = this.state.ctcValue; let baseSalary = ctcValue / 2; let basicSalary_forHRA = baseSalary / 2; let daValue1 = ctcValue - (baseSalary + basicSalary_forHRA); let totalEarnedvalue = baseSalary + basicSalary_forHRA + daValue1; let TDS_value = 100; let PT_value = 100; let PF_value = 100; let netpay_value = totalEarnedvalue - (TDS_value + PT_value + PF_value); this.setState({ baseSalary: baseSalary, hraValue: basicSalary_forHRA, daValue: daValue1, totalEarned: totalEarnedvalue, TDS: TDS_value, PT: PT_value, PF: PF_value, NetPay: netpay_value, }); }; render() { return (

); } } export default InputsValue;
